CORE_CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x19
Size:
0x1
Source:
core_regfile.rdl

Description

Core control register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[7:3] reserved rw - -
[2] CFG_DONE rw - -
[1] LOAD_IN rw - -
[0] RESET rw - -

Field Descriptions

reserved

Unused

CFG_DONE

Core has been properly configured by the processor

LOAD_IN

A pulse on this register loads the neural network with the input data from the INPUT_GRID_* flops

RESET

When 1'b1, reset the status registers, so that a new input can be loaded in
